name: Sorcerer Killer Set
description: The outfit worn by Toji Fushiguro. Enhances physical prowess to the limit. Perfect for those who forsake cursed energy for raw power.

name: Heian Era Robe
description: Ancient robes from the golden age of Jujutsu. Worn by the most powerful sorcerers of the Heian period.

name: Infinity White Suit
description: Gojo Satoru's signature all-white attire. The blindfold is sold separately. Radiates an aura of invincibility.
howToObtain: Roll Limitless Clan and reach Max Mastery

name: Ocean Blue Sailor Vest
description: A stylish vest resembling Riko Amanai's uniform. Brings back memories of the Star Plasma Vessel incident.

name: Magma Jacket
description: A jacket radiating intense heat. The fabric is woven with volcanic essence and resists extreme temperatures.
howToObtain: Defeat Jogo Boss on Hard Mode

name: Tokyo Jujutsu High Uniform
description: Standard issue uniform for Tokyo students. The classic black ensemble worn by first-years.

name: Kyoto Jujutsu High Uniform
description: The traditional uniform of Kyoto's sorcerers. Features a more formal design compared to Tokyo's.

name: Battle Brother Tracksuit
description: Todo's preferred combat attire. Designed for maximum mobility during intense battles and clapping sessions.

name: 7:3 Business Suit
description: Nanami's impeccable business attire. Perfect for those who take their work seriously. Never work overtime.

name: Ten Shadows Coat
description: A dark coat that seems to absorb light. Megumi's signature long jacket that complements shadow techniques.

name: Straw Doll Combat Dress
description: Nobara's stylish battle outfit. Never sacrifice fashion for function. Comes with tool belt for nails.

name: Tiger Vessel Hoodie
description: Yuji Itadori's casual hoodie. Comfortable for everyday wear and sudden demon battles.

name: Jackpot Gambler Outfit
description: Hakari's flashy gambling attire. Fortune favors the bold, and this outfit shows you mean business.
howToObtain: Win Jackpot 10 times in Idle Death Gamble

name: Exchange Student Uniform
description: Yuta Okkotsu's overseas uniform. Carries the weight of countless battles fought abroad.

name: Zenin Combat Gear
description: Maki's specialized combat outfit. Designed for those who rely on physical prowess and cursed tools.

name: Rice Ball Hoodie
description: Inumaki's cozy hoodie with high collar. Perfect for hiding the snake-and-fangs seal on your tongue.

name: Cursed Corpse Coat
description: A fluffy coat inspired by Panda. Surprisingly warm and durable. Not made from actual pandas.

name: Curse User Monk Robe
description: The flowing robes worn by Geto Suguru. Symbolizes the path of curse manipulation.

name: Soul Stitched Outfit
description: An outfit that appears sewn together from different souls. Disturbing yet powerful.

name: Death Painting Coat
description: Choso's signature coat with blood-red accents. For those who fight for family above all else.

name: Frost Servant Robe
description: Uraume's icy ceremonial robes. The fabric stays perpetually cold and enhances ice techniques.

name: Brain Binding Suit
description: Mysterious attire worn across millennia. The stitched head design is purely cosmetic... probably.

name: Volcanic Spirit Armor
description: Armor forged from cooled magma. Provides excellent protection while boosting fire abilities.

name: Ocean Domain Garb
description: Flowing garments that seem to move like water. Enhances all water-based techniques.
howToObtain: Clear Horizon of the Captivating Skandha

name: Deadly Sentencing Suit
description: Higuruma's formal courtroom attire. Justice will be served, one way or another.

name: Summer Festival Yukata
description: Traditional summer festival wear. A rare peaceful moment between battles.

name: S-Rank Mission Gear
description: Professional tactical equipment for dangerous missions. Every pocket has a purpose.

name: Shibuya Survivor Outfit
description: Battle-worn attire from the Shibuya Incident. A testament to survival against impossible odds.

name: Culling Game Player Uniform
description: Standard attire for Culling Game participants. Marked with your current point total.

name: Ancient Sorcerer Garb
description: Robes from the age when sorcerers ruled Japan. Carries the weight of a thousand years.
